website_summaries.verdict: Everyone will know when you get a bull's-eye, thanks to the revving motorcycle engine that announces your fantastic throw.
pros: Motorcycle sounds emitted when you get a bull's-eye
Comes with 6 darts plus spare tips and AC adapter
cons: You may want to consider a different kind

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one
customer_reviews.text: Returned two of these. First one - the on/off button would not work. Second one - lights would not turn off without unplugging it. Very expensive for the average quality. :(
customer_reviews.author: Lake girl

customer_reviews.title: Pretty dissapointing for the price
customer_reviews.text: Darts only stick about a third of the time and when playing against the computer opponent and choosing 50/50 bulls, half the time the Bulls only register 25. Then the next round 50. Pretty dissapointing for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Dunn Matson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to used board with great features
customer_reviews.text: Six of us played darts on this board. The board kept score while we played. The board also advanced to the next player. Loved the nouse and lights that went off when someone won a game. This is a week-made board that lives up to the Harley emblem. Our friends were so impressed that they bought their own.
customer_reviews.author: Towanda Jo

customer_reviews.title: Board came out of box with broken screen and no set of darts
customer_reviews.text: Ordered dartboard for son's birthday, upon opening the lighted digital screen was broke, and was supposed to come with set of darts, no darts in the box. And I guess "return window" has expired, so cant return or exchange. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Connie Thackery

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome dart board. Darts aren't the best quality though so we bought different ones to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product overall. My husband loves it.... the sound, lights, playing options....!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun value!!!
customer_reviews.text: lots of fun with many gaming options!!!!! When you hit the bulls eye, it makes a revving sound!
customer_reviews.author: pierre klee

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this. Did not work properly out of the box. Was unable to play anything. Returning for my money back. What a waste of time .
customer_reviews.author: Julie C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Even the kids will get a kick out of playing and hearing the rumble sound.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy D

customer_reviews.title: Really  Like the product
customer_reviews.text: I have been playing on this game from last 6 months . its a great entertaining game when you have a party . Love the Lights on it and it has many games embedded into it . Good Stuff
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Might be worth it if yours powers up
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a 21st birthday gift. Wouldn't power up at all upon opening. Past the 30 day return window so I'm stuck with an expensive broken plastic piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No darts
customer_reviews.text: Opened box and hung looks great but no darts were included like it said
customer_reviews.author: Darek

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install with good
customer_reviews.text: We utilize this game board 2-3 nights per week. Easy to install with good functionality
customer_reviews.author: Rick A. Cirillo

customer_reviews.title: It looks good as it did on the picture
customer_reviews.text: This dartboard is great have no complaints everything works fantastic I would recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Donna

product_meta.title: Harley-Davidson Electronic Dartboard with Dart & Extra Tips (2 Sets)
product_meta.description: Harley-Davidson electronic dart board. Up your game by adding this Harley-Davidson electronic dartboard to your recreational area. This dartboard is suitable for 1-8 players and plays 48 games including cricket and 01. The 4 color LCD scoring panel is easily visible from the throw line and the scoring areas light up and flash. Another built in feature in the classic sound of the Harley-Davidson engine which is triggered when you get a Bulls eye or win your game. Your dart game just became more enjoyable and will deliver endless hours of competitive fun. Includes: 6 darts with spare tips, game manual, and AC adapter. Size: 18" x 24".
feature_bullets: 2 sets of darts with spare tips
